column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou's is firmly in the Mount Rushmore of Pizza in Chicago.  Their buttery
column2: flakey crust separates their deep dish from your run of the mill Chicago style joint.  Don't sleep on their thin crust either
column3: which is also among the best in the city.  If you're not in a coma after throwing back a few heavy slices
column4: their warm cookie with ice cream is a fantastic desert to cap off what is always an incredible meal.
